nodes.text: Thyferra was a planet located in the galaxy's Inner Rim, on the Rimma Trade Route. It was the homeworld of the Vratix species. Arvel Crynyd piloted Z-95 Headhunters for a bacta cartel on the world. Following the Battle of Exegol in 35 ABY, Thyferra was in open rebellion against the First Order.
The grain Vratixia renanicus, a type of barley, was originally cultivated on Thyferra.

Thyferra was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a map featured in the 2016 StarWars.com article Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?. It first appeared in  X-Wing: The Bacta War, a 1997 Star Wars Legends novel written by Michael A. Stackpole and its first visual appearance was in Star Wars: Rogue Squadron from 1998.
